definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: An edited version will also be played in movie theaters.
sentences.chinese: 剪辑版的短片也将在电影院上映。

sentences.english: People stampeded from the burning cinema.
sentences.chinese: 人们从着了火的电影院里纷纷逃出。

sentences.english: The local cinema has been made into a bingo hall .
sentences.chinese: 当地的电影院已被改成宾果游戏厅了。

sentences.english: That drive-in theater always has good movies.
sentences.chinese: 汽车电影院的电影一向不错。

sentences.english: Dad : Let's go to see the movie. It's time to begin.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸和妈妈一起走着去电影院看《人鬼情未了》。

sentences.english: I want to see a film, How can I get to the cinema?
sentences.chinese: 我想看一场电影，我怎么能到达电影院？

sentences.english: Around 11 o'clock the crowds start filtering out of the cinema.
sentences.chinese: 十一点左右，人群开始从电影院里逐渐走出来。

sentences.english: Beside the theatre, there is a side street.
sentences.chinese: 在电影院的旁边，有一条小街。

sentences.english: A ship whistles as it enters the harbor… Is the sound coming from the harbor or from the stereophonic speakers inside the cinema?
sentences.chinese: 大船入港的鸣笛声响起，是电影院外港边的声响？

sentences.english: There are cinemas, bistros , museums, etc that your sim can visit.
sentences.chinese: 有电影院，酒吧，博物馆，等等，你是可以访问的。

sentences.english: Age group 15-24 goes to the cinema the most.
sentences.chinese: 根据美国调查一般15岁至24岁去电影院的最多。

sentences.english: 12-22 So now she was going to the del Prado.
sentences.chinese: 现在她要去普拉多电影院。

sentences.english: My girlfriend and I are habitual cinema-goers.
sentences.chinese: 电影观众我和女友是电影院的常客。

sentences.english: They think the sound effects in the cinema attracts them forever.
sentences.chinese: 他们感觉电影院的音响效果是永远吸引他们的地方。

sentences.english: They queued to get into the cinema.
sentences.chinese: 他们排队等候进入电影院。

sentences.english: So let's say you're in a movie theater and you're watching a fantastic movie,
sentences.chinese: 假设你正在电影院，你正在看一部特别棒的片子。

definition: to premiere (a movie or TV show)/premiere (of a movie)/first-run (movie)/to greet (the eye) before anything else (e.g. when entering a room)
to reserve all the seats (or a large block of seats) at a theater, restaurant etc
theater chain (abbr. for 電影院線|电影院线)
